page.title: 09HOUSING
page.content: {HOUSING 2} Our area is a conservation area and all new buildings have to conform by using local stone and pantiles. Architects and builders buy houses and modernise them.Sometimes they live in them and sometimes they sell them. Several years ago there were quite a high proportion of holiday homes but now there are very few. Two years ago a resident broke the conservation rules by installing solar panels.This caused a furore,attracting the attention of the national as well as the local press and they were subsequently removed. We think that the housing in this area is particularily attractive and we enjoy living in them.
